organisation_name: COUNCIL OF CATALAN CHAMBERS OF COMMERCE (GCCCC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
International Chamber of Commerce 
AICO- Iberoamerican Association of Chambers of Commerce 
ASCAME- Association of Mediterranean Chambers of Commerce
goals__remit: GCCC is a regional Spanish Chamber of Commerce established under the law 14/2002, of June 27th, aiming at coordinating the activity of all 13 Catalan Chambers and to guarantee the joint dialogue with the main institutions of the country. It coordinates the activities of internationalization and other programs, proposing measures and actions for the promotion and the defence of the economic general interest of industry and commerce.
